system.description: When you take advantage of an opening to escape a situation, roll with BLOOD.

miss.label: Miss
miss.value: The MC tells you what interesting thing happens.

weakHit.label: Weak Hit
weakHit.value:
On a hit, you get away and choose 1. On a 7-9, the MC chooses one as well:

  • you suffer harm during your escape
  • you end up in another dangerous situation
  • you leave something important behind
  • you owe an NPC a Debt for their aid
  • you give into your base nature and mark corruption

strongHit.label: Strong Hit
strongHit.value:
On a hit, you get away and choose 1. On a 10+, the MC doesn't choose one.

  • you suffer harm during your escape
  • you end up in another dangerous situation
  • you leave something important behind
  • you owe an NPC a Debt for their aid
  • you give into your base nature and mark corruption
